events.description:
[Pollux] Black ([Sirius Orion][Sirius_III]'s Maternal Grandfather) dies
at an unknown point this year.

[Pollux]: <../people/black/pollux/>

events.source: J. K. Rowling. [The Black Family Tree](https://harrypotter.fandom.com/wiki/House_of_Black?file=JKRBlackFamilyTree.jpg) Last viewed 2021-01-22
